item.title: Eldertuin The Fortress
item.author: Author
item.description: This build is centered on taking advantage of Headhunter buffs. It has decent Armour, maximum Block and high Attack Speed to apply multiple Impales & Bleeds via Anomalous Shield Crush. In adddition, the build uses Inspired Learning while levelling, mapping and saving currency for an actual Headhunter, and sacrifices some 'on paper' DPS in order to ensure that every stolen buff will be beneficial.
